articles.author: Lawrence Bonk
articles.title: Venmo now lets you send crypto to other users for some reason
articles.description:
Paypal-owned money transfer service Venmo dipped its toes into cryptocurrencies in 2021 after opening up an in-app trading platform.
 That was just for individuals to buy or sell crypto. Now, the company is going further into the once-heralded digital curren…

articles.title: Bitcoin Pyramid Scheme Fraudster Ordered to Pay $3.4 Billion
articles.description: The Commodities Futures Trading Commission patted itself on the back for winning one of the largest civil cases against a crypto crook, even if most—or any—of those affected will see any of their money returned. On Thursday, a Texas judge issued a default jud…

articles.author: Mariella Moon
articles.title: White House proposes 30 percent tax on electricity used for crypto mining
articles.description: The Biden administration wants to impose a 30 percent tax on the electricity used by cryptocurrency mining operations, and it has included the proposal in its budget for the fiscal year of 2024. In a blog post on the White House website, the administration ha…

articles.title: Hacker Pleads Guilty to Hijacking Barack, Elon, and Kim K's Twitter Accounts
